comment.text: This translation key is used to display a button label that opens an editor for an organization in the same tab. When translated, it should be read as "Open {organizationName} editor in same tab". The translation appears on a toggle button within a UI element.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Open... in same tab" is better translated as "Aç... eynı sekmede" or similar, rather than "Aç... eynı tabda". 'Tab' (English loanword) isn't the best fit in this context. 'Sekme' would be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Eyni sekmede {{organizationName}} redaktorunu açın

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "same tab" is better translated as 'същия таб' rather than 'същия раздел'. 'Раздел' means 'section' which isn't the direct equivalent of a tab in this context. While 'раздел' could be used, 'таб' would preserve the original meaning more accurately.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Отворете редактора на {{organizationName}} в същия таб

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Otevřít editor {{organizationName}} na stejné kartě' is a literal translation but not idiomatic. It's a bit awkward. 'Editor' is a borrowed word, but it could be clarified. Also, 'stejné kartě' is technically correct but sounds unnatural for this context. A more natural phrasing would suggest opening the editor in the same window or in a new tab within the same window.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otevřít editor {{organizationName}} ve stejné záložce

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a hyphen to connect 'organizationName' and 'Editor'. In German, a more natural phrasing would use 'des' or 'den' before 'Editor'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}} Editor in derselben Registerkarte öffnen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using 'des' or 'den' can make the phrase flow more naturally in German.  The current hyphenated form is understandable but less common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}}s Editor in derselben Registerkarte öffnen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ανοίξτε το πρόγραμμα επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα' is overly formal. A more natural phrasing would be 'Άνοιγμα του προγράμματος επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα' or 'Να ανοίξει το πρόγραμμα επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Άνοιγμα του προγράμματος επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb 'Ανοίξτε' is in the imperative form, which may not be the best choice for a setting option.  Consider a more neutral phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Να ανοίξει το πρόγραμμα επεξεργασίας {{organizationName}} στην ίδια καρτέλα

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Open ... in the same tab' is a bit literal. A more natural Spanish translation for opening an editor in the same tab would be something like 'Abrir el editor ... en la misma ventana' or 'Abrir el editor ... en una pestaña nueva'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abrir el editor {{organizationName}} en la misma ventana

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "dans le même onglet" is a literal translation of "in the same tab." A more natural and idiomatic French phrasing would be something like "dans un nouvel onglet" (in a new tab) or "dans l'onglet courant" (in the current tab).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ouvrir l'éditeur {{organizationName}} dans un nouvel onglet

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Նույն ներդիրում բացեք {{organizationName}} խմբագիրը' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. 'Նույն ներդիրում բացեք' translates to 'Open in the same folder/directory', which is not the intended meaning. It should imply opening in the same tab.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'Բացեք {{organizationName}} խմբագիրը նույն աշխատասեղանում' (Open the {{organizationName}} editor in the same workspace/tab) or '{{organizationName}} խմբագիրը բացեք նույն էջում' (Open the {{organizationName}} editor on the same page).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "같은 탭에서 {{organizationName}} 편집기를 여세요" is a bit awkward. '여세요' implies opening something for someone, which isn't the intended meaning. The correct meaning should be 'open in the same tab'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 같은 탭에서 {{organizationName}} 편집기를 엽니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses a space before the curly braces.  While not strictly incorrect, maintaining consistency with the English format (no space before `{{organizationName}}`) is preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເປີດຕົວບັນນາຈັກ {{organizationName}} ໃນແທັບດຽວກັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "tajā pašā cilnē" is a literal translation of "same tab" but might not be the most natural or idiomatic phrasing in Latvian for a UI element. It's grammatically correct, but could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "tajā pašā izdevumā" or "tajā pašā logā" depending on the specific user interface context.  The most accurate translation depends on what 'tab' represents in the application. If it refers to a browser tab, "tajā pašā cilnē" is acceptable, but "tajā pašā logā" may be more user-friendly.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Otwórz edytor {{organizationName}} w tej samej karcie' is not ideal. 'w tej samej karcie' literally translates to 'in this same tab'. A more natural and accurate translation would be 'w nowej karcie' (in a new tab) or 'w istniejącej karcie' (in an existing tab), depending on the desired nuance. The English phrase implies opening the editor in the same tab as the current page, not necessarily a tab that already exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otwórz edytor {{organizationName}} w nowej karcie

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Abra o editor {{organizationName}} na mesma guia" doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Open... in same tab'. A more accurate translation would convey the action of opening the editor within the existing tab. The current translation reads as simply opening the editor in the tab, not specifically in the *same* tab.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abra o editor {{organizationName}} na aba atual

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Abra o editor {{organizationName}} na mesma guia' doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. A more accurate translation would be 'Abrir o editor {{organizationName}} na mesma aba'. 'Guia' is often used for browser tabs, but 'aba' is more common in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Abrir o editor {{organizationName}} na mesma aba

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a formal imperative verb form ("Откройте"). A less formal, more user-friendly option might be preferred depending on the application's tone.  While grammatically correct, it may sound abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Раскройте редактор {{organizationName}} на той же вкладке.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'තබන්න {{organizationName}} සංස්කාරකයම ටැබයේ විවෘත කරන්න' is not the most natural way to express 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab'. It sounds somewhat literal and awkward. The word 'තබන්න' (tabanna) doesn't fit the context well.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like '{{organizationName}} සංස්කාරකයම එකම ටැබ් එකේ විවෘත කරන්න' or '{{organizationName}} සංස්කාරකයම ටැබ් එකේම විවෘත කරන්න'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala word order could be improved for better readability. While not incorrect, it's not the most common flow in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider reordering the phrase to place the verb 'විවෘත කරන්න' (vivruta karna - to open) closer to the beginning or end for a smoother feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Otvorte redaktor {{organizationName}} v tej istej záložke' is not the most natural phrasing in Slovak. 'Redaktor' is a direct translation of 'editor' but might sound a bit formal or technical in this context. A more common and user-friendly phrasing would involve something like 'otvoriť editor...' or 'otvoríte aplikáciu...'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Otvorte aplikáciu {{organizationName}} v tej istej záložke' or 'Otvorte editor {{organizationName}} v tej istej záložke' depending on the desired level of formality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Odpri urejevalnik {{organizationName}} v istem zavihku" is not ideal. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would use a preposition indicating the target of the action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Odpri urejevalnik {{organizationName}} v istem zavihku.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Отвори {{organizationName}} уређивач у истој картици' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab".  'Отвори' is a general 'open', but a more precise term would be needed depending on the context. 'Уређивач' is editor, which is accurate, but the phrase structure is slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Покрени {{organizationName}} уређивач у истој картици' (Launch {{organizationName}} editor in the same tab) or 'Искључи {{organizationName}} уређивач у истој картици' (Open/Activate {{organizationName}} editor in the same tab) – the best choice depends on the user experience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Aynı sekmede {{organizationName}} düzenleyicisini açın' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Turkish. A more natural phrasing would be something like '{{organizationName}} düzenleyicisini aynı sekmede aç'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{organizationName}} düzenleyicisini aynı sekmede aç

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Відкрити редактор {{organizationName}} на тій самій вкладці' is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Open {{organizationName}} editor in same tab' in Ukrainian.  'На тій самій вкладці' literally means 'on that same tab' which is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would use 'у тій же вкладці'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Відкрити редактор {{organizationName}} у тій же вкладці
